title: Subchapter A - Uniform Fire Prevention and Building Code
content:
Subchapter A - Uniform Fire Prevention and Building Code

State Regulations

Part 1219 - Uniform Fire Prevention and Building Code (§ 1219.1 to 1219.2)

Part 1220 - Residential Construction (§ 1220.1 to 1220.3)

Part 1221 - Building Construction (§ 1221.1 to 1221.3)

Part 1222 - Plumbing Systems (§ 1222.1 to 1222.2)

Part 1223 - Mechanical Systems (§ 1223.1 to 1223.2)

Part 1224 - Fuel Gas Equipment and Systems (§ 1224.1 to 1224.2)

Part 1225 - Fire Prevention (§ 1225.1 to 1225.3)

Part 1226 - Property Maintenance (§ 1226.1 to 1226.3)

Part 1227 - EXISTING BUILDINGS (§ 1227.1 to 1227.2)

Part 1228 - Rail stations (§ 1228.1 to 1228.3)

Part 1229 - Abandonment or Removal of Heating Oil Storage Tanks (Subpart 1229-1 to 1229-3)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
